text: Akira Kurosawa (1910–1998) was a Japanese film director and screenwriter. Kurosawa may also refer to: *Kurosawa (surname), a Japanese surname *Kurosawa Film Studio, a Japanese film studio *Kurosawa (crater), an impact crater on Mercury *254749 Kurosawa, a main-belt asteroid ==See also== *Kurosawa Station (disambiguation), multiple railway stations in Japan
title: Kurosawa (disambiguation)
